locations.name: Positano
locations.description: The tour begins here, described as the Amalfi Coast's postcard-perfect jewel where travelers spend days exploring, relaxing, and soaking in views, implying overnight stays.

locations.name: Capri
locations.description: Travelers are taken to this enchanting island to discover its magic, explore the town, visit gardens, and take boat tours, suggesting sufficient time that includes overnight accommodation.

locations.name: Ravello
locations.description: The journey concludes in this tranquil town, known for stunning views, villas, and gardens. Activities like quiet strolls and intimate dinners indicate this is the final overnight base.
